thread.title_full: Comment on The 20 Hottest Photos Of Milla Jovovich by rajib

author: rajib
title: Comment on The 20 Hottest Photos Of Milla Jovovich by rajib
text:
The 20 Hottest Photos Of Milla Jovovich Published Share Tweet Follow 
We got so much love for Milla that it’s not even funny – what other actress is so wiling to star in bizarre horror and sci-fi action fests without end? She’s probably killed more zombies than any woman in Hollywood, and looks great doing it. With Resident Evil: Afterlife opening today, I figured I’d pay homage to the Ukranian-born actress with some lovely photographs. 
I’m not quite sure what this outfit is – a bikini mixed with a tablecloth? – but man, does Milla ever look good in it. K. Thor Jensen
